tool.name: histories
tool.command:
parsec histories update_history --history_id "$history_id"
#if $annotation --annotation "$annotation" #end if #if $deleted --deleted "$deleted" #end if #if $importable --importable "$importable" #end if #if $name --name "$name" #end if #if $published --published "$published" #end if #if $purged --purged "$purged" #end if #if $tags --tags "$tags" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: annotation
param.label: annotation
param.help: Replace history annotation with given string

param.name: deleted
param.label: deleted
param.help: Mark or unmark history as deleted

param.name: importable
param.label: importable
param.help: Mark or unmark history as importable

param.name: name
param.label: name
param.help: Replace history name with the given string

param.name: published
param.label: published
param.help: Mark or unmark history as published

param.name: purged
param.label: purged
param.help: If True, mark history as purged (permanently deleted). Ignored on Galaxy release_15.01 and earlier

param.name: tags
param.label: tags
param.help: Replace history tags with the given list

tool.help: Update history metadata information. Some of the attributes that can be modified are documented below.
